text:
Imagine undergoing #chemotherapy to treat #cancer. Would you also want to start feasting or #fasting?

Surprise! 

Fasting seems to improve outcomes.

On a related note, cutting out high calorie snacks at nighttime appears to reduce #breastcancer risk.🌛🍕
https://t.co/i1NfyO3JqO https://t.co/d54cNhKujM
